FulfillmentStepDefinition.name: FulfillmentStepDefinition
FulfillmentStepDefinition.description: Represents a definition of a step that must be executed during fulfillment orchestration.

AmendGroupId.description: The fulfillment step group that's added to the fulfillment plan when the step is amended. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

AssignedToId.description: The user or queue associated with the fulfillment step definition.

CancelledGroupId.description: The fulfillment step group that's added to the fulfillment plan when the step is canceled. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

CustomBaseExecutionDate.description: The context tag containing a custom date that's used to calculate the execution time for a future-dated step. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

CustomFulfillmentScope.description: The custom scope to use during order fulfillment. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

DelayOf.description: The value of the delay. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

DelayUnit.description: The unit for the delay of the fulfillment step. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

ExecuteOn.description: Specifies when to execute the fulfillment step. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

ExecuteOnRuleId.description: The expression set for the fulfillment step. The step is executed only when the corresponding expression set is true.

FlowDefinitionName.description: The name of the associated flow.

ForcePlanFreezeDuringExecution.description: Specifies whether to freeze the plan while the step is in progress. If enabled, specifies how to complete the step before resuming the plan. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

IntegrationDefinitionNameId.description: The name of the integration definition thatâ€™s used to set up communication with an external endpoint.

IsSkipBranch.description: Indicates whether the remaining steps in the fulfillment step group are skipped from execution when the Execute On Rule condition is set. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the fulfillment step definition.

PointOfNoReturn.description: The type of source change applied to the line item. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ResumeOnRuleId.description: The expression set for the fulfillment step definition. The step is completed when the expression set is true.

RunAsUserId.description: The user context to run a fulfillment step when the fulfillment operator wants to override the default autoproc user.

Scope.description: The scope of the fulfillment step definition. For example, Bundle or Order.

TaskAllocationType.description: The method of assigning the manual step. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

UsageType.description: The business vertical that uses fulfillment orchestration. For example, Financial Services Cloud.
